overview: When eager, naive Heidi (Whitney Wright) takes an entry-level job as a production assistant for a large fashion company, it isn't as glamorous as she was hoping for, but all that changes when she meets the handsome, powerful CEO, Warren Kaiser (Ryan Driller). He offers her the chance to be his personal assistant, but there's just one catch - she has to be ready for anything, including her sexual surrender as his submissive to play out their erotic fantasies. With Kaiser as her dominant guide, Heidi embarks on a carnal journey exploring their kinkiest desires, from spanking to clit paddling, handcuffs, ball gags, anal and so much more.
title: Seduction of Heidi
